title: Vaping-Related Illnesses Rise to 1,604, CDC Says
text:
There are now 1,604 cases of the vaping-related illnesses, according to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. One additional death was confirmed in Illinois this week, bringing the total fatalities to 34.

Federal officials are still looking for the definitive cause of the illnesses but have flagged illicit THC products and oils as a major factor. THC is the psychoactive ingredient in marijuana. Recent unpublished data from researchers at Boston Children’s Hospital supports that, showing that videos about “do it yourself”...
